_source.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
_source.title: The Shawshank Redemption

_source.synopsis: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
_source.title: The Godfather

_source.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
_source.title: The Dark Knight

_source.synopsis: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
_source.title: The Godfather: Part II

_source.synopsis: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
_source.title: 12 Angry Men

_source.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Saurons's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
_source.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

_source.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
_source.title: Pulp Fiction

_source.synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
_source.title: Schindler's List

_source.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
_source.title: Inception

_source.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
_source.title: Fight Club

_source.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
_source.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

_source.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
_source.title: Forrest Gump

_source.synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
_source.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

_source.synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
_source.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

_source.synopsis: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
_source.title: The Matrix

_source.synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
_source.title: Goodfellas

_source.synopsis: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.
_source.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

_source.synopsis: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
_source.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

_source.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
_source.title: Parasite

_source.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
_source.title: Interstellar

_source.synopsis: In the slums of Rio, two kids paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
_source.title: City of God

_source.synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
_source.title: Spirited Away

_source.synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
_source.title: Saving Private Ryan

_source.synopsis: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
_source.title: The Green Mile

_source.synopsis: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.
_source.title: Life Is Beautiful
